item.title: Our Top Picks from the Kubernetes 1.29 Release
item.description: The latest Kubernetes version, 1.29, was released on December 13th 2023. Inspired by the Mandala and symbolizing universal perfection, it concludes the 2023 release calendar. This version comes with various exciting improvements, many of which will be helpful for users who run databases on Kubernetes. Figure 1 - Mandala created in Excalidraw, not perfectly symmetrical. Here, we highlight this latest release’s four key features and improvements. Let’s take a look at them together.
